scripts.create-build: browserify index.js -s jsonapiparser > builds/jsonapiparser.${npm_package_version}.js && browserify index.js -s jsonapiparser | uglifyjs -c > builds/jsonapiparser.${npm_package_version}.min.js
scripts.create-release: browserify index.js -s jsonapiparser > builds/jsonapiparser.js && browserify index.js -s jsonapiparser | uglifyjs -c > builds/jsonapiparser.min.js
